isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CLUTCH CONTROL LINKAGE - 9200, 9300 AND 9400 SERIES - LUBRICATION

svcproc.title: LUBRICATION
svcproc.para: Lubricate the clutch linkage components (release bearing, clutch release shaft, relay assembly and clevis pins) at the specified intervals. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the proper lubricant and service intervals.

note.para: The nylon bearings on the relay shaft (Item 17, Figure 2) require lubrication at the intervals specified above. The pre-lubricated, sealed bronze bearings on the pedal shaft (Item 6, Figure 2) do not require lubrication.
